name: Diablo
description:
Includes Diablo No-Cd Loader
Includes IPX Wrapper, to allow playing over LAN.
notes:
- Uses No-Cd Loader, but you still have to provide diabdat.mpq from the original CD.
- Use default options during the Windows setup. 
- Close the game with Alt+F4 if it launches automatically at the end.
content:
files:
- patch: http://ftp.blizzard.com:80/pub/diablo/patches/pc/drtl109b.zip
- nocd: http://savagesteel.free.fr/diablo/files/Diablo.1.09b.No-CD.Crack.7z
- ipxwrapper: http://www.solemnwarning.net/ipxwrapper/ipxwrapper-0.6.0.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Diablo/diablo.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: diabdat.mpq
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: patch
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: $CACHE/drtl109b.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Diablo
    file: ipxwrapper
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Diablo
    file: nocd
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/diabdat.mpq
